    • Constructor Detail

      • Ask

        public Ask(AskArgs values,
           DefaultProfileDao profileService,
           Players playerService,
           Questions questionService)
        Instantiates a new response object for the API GET verb.
        Parameters:
        playerEmail - the player email
        mode - - the mode as determined by the URI argument mode. The mode values are restricted to 0 and 1:
        0; Mode.NORMAL The default value when no mode is supplied; the question will contain a random selection of options from the entire pool of profiles.
        1; Mode.REVERSE The question will contain a random selection of profiles wherein the value of Profile.getFirstName() matches the regex [m|M][a|A][t|T][t|T]+.*

        There is no accounting for a REVERSE mode because each question will contain both the name and imageUrl values for all options and the target. This enables a front-end game designer / client developer to implement a REVERSE mode if required, without the inflexibility of having such an option built into the back-end design.

        data - - the Data persistence object;

        questionService - the question service
